game.name: 3DMark Night Raid benchmark
game.categories: Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Steam Leaderboards
game.shortDescription: Night Raid는 내장 그래픽 PC와 Arm의 Windows 10에서 구동되는 Always Connected PC를 테스트 및 비교하기 위한 DirectX 12 벤치마크 프로그램입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Night Raid is a DirectX 12 benchmark test for PCs with integrated graphics and Always Connected PCs powered by Windows 10 on Arm.
